title: Best Air Fryer Snack Recipes
description: Discover our best air fryer snack recipes, including air fryer hard-boiled eggs, air fryer chickpeas, air fryer potato chips, and more.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Our 15 Best Air Fryer Snack Recipes Are So Delicious You Won't Want to Share By Bailey Fink Bailey Fink Bailey Fink is a devout home cook and a news editor at Allrecipes, covering everything from exciting product releases to the newest TikTok trends and why food tastes better at certain restaurants. In her time at Allrecipes, she has researched and written hundreds of articles on a variety of topics, including how-to guides, food news and trends, and product reviews. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Published on April 18, 2022 Close Credits: Buckwheat Queen When the hunger pangs hit, but you don't feel like making a full meal, it's time to turn to a handy snack recipe. And what better snack than a quick and easy one that comes out of your air fryer? Whether you're craving savory, sweet, or crunchy, these air fryer snacks will all fit the bill. And they'll be so tasty that you might just want to eat the whole batch for yourself. Don't worry, we won't tell! Scroll through to find our best air fryer snack recipes that need to be added to your collection immediately. 01 of 16 Spiced Air-Fried Chickpeas View Recipe Save Soup Loving Nicole The perfect savory and crunchy snack! These chickpeas are spiced with smoked paprika, garlic, salt, and cumin. 02 of 16 Air Fryer Pasta Chips View Recipe Save Meredith Food Studios Pasta chips broke the internet and if you haven't experienced them yet, this is your chance. Serve these cheesy chips with marinara sauce for dipping. 03 of 16 Air Fryer Hard-Boiled Eggs View Recipe Save No boiling water is needed for this hard-boiled egg recipe. Simply place them in your air fryer basket, and in 15 minutes they'll be cooked to perfection. 04 of 16 Air Fryer Zucchini Chips View Recipe Save Do you love fried zucchini, but not the oil? These air-fried zucchini are the perfect option — and a great way to use up your summer squash bounty. 05 of 16 Air Fryer Corn Nuts View Recipe Save Salted corn nuts are a super easy and tasty crunchy snack. Use your favorite seasonings, like taco, chili powder, or Cajun, to switch up the flavors! 06 of 16 Air Fryer Potato Chips View Recipe Save Who knew you could make your own potato chips at home in an air fryer? Season your potatoes any way you like and be prepared to never buy store-bought chips again. 07 of 16 Air Fryer Sugared Pecans View Recipe Save These sugared pecans are a great mixture of sweet and salty flavors. Plus, they're ready to satisfy your snack attack in under 20 minutes! 08 of 16 Air Fryer Baba Ganoush View Recipe Save Roast your eggplant and garlic in the air fryer to make this baba ganoush. The roasted veggies will add an exceptional flavor, and the homemade dip will become your new favorite snack. 09 of 16 Air Fryer Ham and Cheese Crescent Rolls View Recipe Save Stuff crescent rolls with ham, cheese, and honey mustard for this easy, hearty snack. Allrecipes Allstar and recipe creator Yoly says you can also use your favorite deli meats and cheeses to switch it up. 10 of 16 Air Fryer Pumpkin Seeds View Recipe Save These crunchy pumpkin seeds offer a nice smoky flavor from the smoked paprika. You're going to crave these all autumn. 11 of 16 Air Fryer Everything Bagel Bites View Recipe Save These cheese-stuffed bagel bites are better than anything you can get at the drive-thru. If you don't want to buy the cheese spread, you can make your own with this Herbed Cheese Spread recipe. 12 of 16 Air Fryer Steak Jerky View Recipe Save Nothing beats homemade jerky. This steak jerky is spiced with soy sauce, steak seasoning, brown sugar, Worcestershire sauce, and liquid smoke — after one bite, you'll never go back to store-bought. 13 of 16 Air Fryer Roasted Salsa View Recipe Save Roast your tomatoes, jalapeño, garlic, and red onions for a delicious depth of flavor. Then purée the mixture to your desired salsa consistency and serve with your favorite tortilla chips. 14 of 16 Air Fryer Hush Puppies View Recipe Save Air-fried hush puppies in just 25 minutes — it doesn't get much easier than that. Of course, hush puppies make a great side dish, but we also love to snack on them with a drizzle of honey. 15 of 16 Air-Fried Sweet Wontons View Recipe Save These sweet wontons are stuffed with peanut butter, brown sugar, honey, and toasted sesame seeds. Serve topped with confectioners' sugar. 16 of 16 More Inspiration Our 20 Best Air Fryer Recipes Give You Permission to Eat "Fried" Food All Day Long 25 Best Air Fryer Main Dishes for Dinner Air Fryer Appetizer and Snack Recipes Explore more: Everyday Cooking Cooking by Equipment Air Fryer Appetizers and Snacks Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why!
